name: @fto-consult/common
description: Un ensemble de bibliothèques et d'utilistaires communs pour le développement d'applications javascript

scripts.build-docs: npm run delete-docs && npx jsdoc -r src  -c ./jsdoc.conf.json -d docs
scripts.update: npm i @craftzdog/pouchdb-adapter-websql-core@latest pouchdb@latest pouchdb-authentication@latest pouchdb-erase@latest pouchdb-find@latest prop-types@latest qs@latest react-fast-compare@latest react-is@latest react-native-get-random-values@latest sanitize-filename@latest stable-hash@latest written-number@latest swr@latest

author: Boris Fouomene
